{{quote|No, Fujikawa. A small Japanese firm, trying to to get themselves noticed.|[[Joseph Robertson (Earth-616)|Robbie Robertson]]|Spider-Man 2099 Meets Spider-Man Vol 1 1}}
Fujikawa Industries was running experiments on a temporal energy generator and accidentally caused [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] to trade places with his [[Earth-928|2099 A.D.]] [[Miguel O'Hara (Earth-928)|counterpart]]. Later that day, they again tested their generator, causing tremors in the space-time continuum.{{r|Spider-Man 2099 Meets Spider-Man Vol 1 1}}
